name: Super Kirbo Simulator 64
description:
Controls:

  • Space - Switch between camera views
  • The Konami code - You'll have to see for yourself ;)

Super Kirbo Simulator 64 is a small 'simulator' game based around a totally original character I made while learning Blender.

I am making a series of short videos on Youtube about Kirbo, partly because I thought it would be funny, and partly because I'm using it as practice to get better at Blender.

You can check out the youtube channel here
